entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
